description: This was probably the hottest day of this year so far. The heat was driving me nuts. But all my anger just vanished when this cutie entered my office. Normally I would be disappointed that he didn´t bother to put on something more formal, but I let it slide. He was almost naked, how could I be mad? Maybe it was a new hip kind of dressing up, the boy was into fashion so he knew better than me. I remembered a job offer from a well-known fashion boutique we had in store. This was the perfect time to use it. I could see the boy was intrigued, who wouldn´t like to have his hobby as a job? He was also broke because he moved to Prague some time ago. It wasn´t very hard to make this interview go the way I wanted. We both needed a shower when I was done with him:).
title: Dirty Scout 42
